MIME element (text/plain) 
DMCA NOTICE TO AUTHORIZED AGENT (LISTED IN A DIRECTORY MAINTAINED BY   
U.S. COPYRIGHT OFFICE) AND INFRINGER 
 
Please be advised that Flynet Pictures, the owner of the exclusive   
rights in and to the Photograph(s) entitled,  "p 4945 " This   
copyrighted material is currently being infringed at the following   
URLs and/or the infringing activity is being found at the following   
URLs: 
 
http://www.hollywoodgrind.com/?p=4945 
http://www.hollywoodgrind.com/images/2007/3/violet.jpg 
 
 
and its related pages. On behalf of Flynet Pictures, I request that   
the foregoing material and/or activity be removed or access to it   
disabled. 
 
 
You may contact me as follows: 
NAME:            Jason Kirk 
ADDRESS:     1320 N Sycamore Ave 
                       Hollywood, CA 90028 
TEL:               323 461 7564 
FAX :              323-461-7564 
E-MAIL:           Jason@flynetpictures.com 
 
On behalf of Flynet Pictures, as the owner of the exclusive right of   
the copyrighted material at issue in this notice, I hereby state that   
I have a good faith belief that the use of the material complained of   
is not authorized by the copyright owner, his agent, or the law. I   
hereby state, under penalty of perjury under the laws of the State of   
CA and the United States, that the information herein is accurate 
 
 
======================================================= 
This email and its contents are confidential. If you 
are not the intended recipient, please do not disclose 
or use the information within this email or its 
attachments. If you have received this email in error, 
please delete it immediately. Thank you, Flynet Pictures. 
=======================================================
